events.message: I ordered a package over two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived and the tracking number shows no updates.
The case has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on customer’s report of missing shipment updates.
An agent has been assigned to handle this delayed delivery inquiry and assist the customer promptly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll help you track down the issue right away.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can check the shipment status?
Sure, my order number is ORD1234567 and the tracking number is TRK8901234. I haven’t seen any updates for over a week.
After checking, it appears your package is delayed at the local distribution center. We can request an expedited shipment or offer a refund if preferred.
I would prefer the package to be delivered as soon as possible rather than a refund. Please expedite it, thanks.
Since the delay is significant, I’m escalating this to the logistics manager to prioritize delivery.
Your shipment has been prioritized and should arrive within 48 hours. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Checking in to confirm you received your package and if everything is satisfactory now.
I received the package yesterday, and everything is in perfect condition. Thanks for the quick help!
The case is now closed as the delivery issue has been resolved and the customer is satisfied.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on their support experience.
